short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays image preview, class name, dimensions, size, and alt text on hover.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension displays image preview, class name, pixel, size, file extension, and alt text on hover.

To use this extension:

1.Install the extension in your Chrome browser.
2.Hover over an image to see the preview and information.

Image Insights is designed to provide quick access to image details without needing to inspect the source code.
